CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(FS_Spicy_Cherry__c, "Pibb/Pibb Zero"), "C37", Null) + IF(ISPICKVAL(FS_Spicy_Cherry__c, "Dr Pepper/Diet Dr Pepper"), "C38", Null)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(FS_Spicy_Cherry__c, "Pibb/Pibb Zero/Add FUZE/Remove Dasani"), "C37,C76", Null)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(FS_Spicy_Cherry__c, "Pibb/Pibb Zero/Add FUZE/Remove Powerade"), "C37,C76", Null)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(FS_Spicy_Cherry__c, "Pibb/Pibb Zero/Add FUZE/Remove Vitaminwater"), "C37,C76", Null)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(FS_Spicy_Cherry__c, "Dr Pepper/Diet Dr Pepper/Add FUZE/Remove Dasani"), "C38,C76", Null)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(FS_Spicy_Cherry__c, "Dr Pepper/Diet Dr Pepper/Add FUZE/Remove Powerade"), "C38,C76", Null)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(FS_Spicy_Cherry__c, "Dr Pepper/Diet Dr Pepper/Add FUZE/Remove Vitaminwater"), "C38,C76", Null)
CustomField.label: Spicy Cherry Brand Codes
